text: Taba unako samudayako nayakale jo kaphira thi'e, spastasanga bhannathaleh ki yo ta timi jastai manisa ho, timimathi sresthata prapta garna cahancha ra yadi allahale caheko bha'e kunai pharistaharula'i (svargadutaharula'i) patha'une thiyo. Hamile ta aphno purvajaharubata yo kura kahilyai pani sunenaum
